definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The Mandans protected themselves against the disaster of crop failure and accompanying hunger.
sentences.chinese: 曼丹人保護自己免受作物歉收以及由此引發的飢餓。

sentences.english: Drought and poor harvests led to a food crisis in Niger.
sentences.chinese: 尼日爾則因爲旱災和糧食歉收正面臨糧食危機。

sentences.english: Famine eventuated from the crop failure.
sentences.chinese: 因莊稼歉收饑荒終於發生了。

sentences.english: The drought and crop failure were the most serious in North China in a hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 那幾年，華北平原發生了百年不遇的大旱災和歉收。

sentences.english: The crops failed because the seasons was dry.
sentences.chinese: 因爲氣候乾旱，作物歉收。

sentences.english: Too small spacing among the plant stands is causative of the crop failure.
sentences.chinese: 植株間間隔太小是作物歉收的原因。

sentences.english: What if there’s a Russia-scale crop failure here at home?
sentences.chinese: 如果美國出現俄羅斯規模的農作物歉收又會怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The shortage of rice was credited to lack of rain.
The failure of the harvest again produced famine and unpeopled farms and hamlets.
sentences.chinese: 歉收又造成了饑荒並迫使人民遷離農場和農村。

sentences.english: I i am the sunlight on ripened grain.
sentences.chinese: 無印良品淘寶我是歉收的太陽光。

sentences.english: The crops failed because the season was dry。
sentences.chinese: 因爲氣候乾旱，作物歉收。

sentences.english: When the state of Qi had a drought and harvested little grain , many people went hungry .
sentences.chinese: 齊國遭遇了乾旱，糧食歉收，很多人沒有飯喫。

sentences.english: Have you had any crop failures?
sentences.chinese: 那你有過什麼歉收的過去麼？

sentences.english: Due to the crop failure caused by drought, the villages' hope for good harvest dashed to pieces.
sentences.chinese: 由於乾旱歉收，村民豐收的希望泡湯了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of rice paddy fields have failed harvests due to drought.
sentences.chinese: 成千上百片稻田因乾旱而歉收。

sentences.english: Prices have been forced up by the poor crop.
sentences.chinese: 因莊稼歉收物價有所上升。

definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
